cards.name: Armorite
cards.description: Armorite is a mysterious Pokemon rarely seen in its natural habitat of wooded areas. Wearing dark and powerful armor, Armorite can be intimidating at first glance. However, peaceful by nature, it can be seen calmly using its Fissure and Nudge abilities to find its way around the forest and find food. It is a swift and cunning Pokemon that can surprise foes with its unique strength.
cards.image_prompt: Armorite::0 a strong fairy-type pokemon::1.8, wearing dark armor, in a woods environment, pink and purple ambient lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
